name: Perfumare DATING GAME
description:
Happy Valentine's Day! I am happy to present you the Perfumare Dating Game, a short interactive story with the elements of a quiz and point-and-click.  Spend an ordinary day with the ROs/PFM characters without the 'burden' of he plot. Enjoy!
